channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street light covered by tree growth, 14th July
item.description:
The street light number 28 on springbank road is completely covered by tree growth and still turning on wasting electricity as it is not illuminating the road as it should. Please schedule cut back of the trees so the street light 28 is visible on this busy road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106, Springbank Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Partial Pavement Obstruction, 14th July
item.description:
Can you get the residents to cut back these hedges to give back the full width of the pavement. I'm struggling to get my disabled partner past

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Church Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Blocked or collapsed counterfort drain, 14th July
item.description:
Have contacted Severn Trent many of times have a contract with them that they are suppose to maintain the pipes on my land but did not even know they were there when I contacted them. The reservoir fills up in the winter the overflow comes down the hill my 4 counterfort drains are suppose to feed the water through to the Severn Trent station across the road these need checking from Severn Trent pumping station & sending a camera up these drains the manhole covers are on Severn Trentâ€™s side this is one of the reasons why the road is always flooded please look into this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: High grass between bus shelter and direction of Cirencester, 14th July
item.description:
Drivers exiting Coberley cannot see towards Cirencester where cars are approaching at 60mph. Car drivers are lower than vans or 4x4 so are in effect pulling out blind. The grass from the bus shelter for about 39metres towards Cirencester needs cutting. An RTC involving 4 vehicles happened last week as a result of a driver pulling out unable to see over the grass verge .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Fly Tipping in Milham Playing Field, 12th July
item.description:
A house in Milham Road has dumped broken paving slabs trees, soil, and what looks like Asbestos over their fence onto the bank of the stream. A lot has fallen into the stream. If yo follow the stream along there are two areas where this has been dumped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Millham Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
